Name: Rusty Margarita
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: The rich honeyed notes from Drambuie combine harmoniously with tequila and add an extra dimension to this tasty Margarita. This cocktail is perhaps at its best once the ice has melted to add a little extra dilution.
History: Created in December 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London. More Margarita variations and the history of the Margarita
Nutrition: One serving of Rusty Margarita contains 171 calories
